summary: Burden to Bear update!
title: Burden to Bear update!
body:
Izuku felt a quiet, gentle pressure against his back. A hand, moving in slow, hesitant circles. A voice he couldn’t quite place telling him it would be okay, somehow. Telling him that they’d get Bakugo back.  

That was the last thing Izuku remembered, that quiet and familiar but confident voice.

[Chapter 18] or [From the Beginning]

summary: things have changed for me, but that's alright
title: things have changed for me, but that's alright
description:
by kusendhelpold

Almost every serious conversation Izuku Midoriya ever had started with a simple, casual, “Hey.” This conversation seemed no different, except he was the perpetrator now.
A knock on a door was the only thing separating him and the possibility that he might ruin the longest-lasting relationship he’s ever had with someone that’s not his mother. He had to be brave. He had to knock on the door, or risk not knowing what might’ve happened if he did.
Knock knock.

Words: 1919, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

summary:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ bakugou katsuki ˎˊ˗ 

  Anonymous said: “hi luvs could i request headcanons for bakugou falling for someone...
body:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ bakugou katsuki ˎˊ˗

Anonymous said: “hi luvs could i request headcanons for bakugou falling for someone completely opposute of him? ty <3″

here it is, hope you enjoyed!

･:*✧ cerulean.

At first, he couldn’t believe it. The fact that you are shy and kind to everyone else, the complete opposite of a feral gremlin - and the fact that you are his partner; romantically involved. How he had gotten your heart in the first place, he wasn’t sure.

But he sure as hell would cherish you until the end of time.

You are a ray of sunshine, the light of the class and never fails to brighten a gloomy situation. You were always there for everyone, tries to comfort and gives advice no matter how shitty it is. You were always doing your best, always working hard no matter the consequences. You were there first when you knew he needed someone.

For you, recognising the red and green flags, the change of his expression, it was like reading an open book. You were there in an instant the moment you realised he was feeling down; you gave him space when he needed it and he was grateful for the fact that you can read the atmosphere with ease.

That’s what makes you special.

And that’s how you stole his heart in the first place, and he was glad he got you before anyone else could.

• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ bakugou katsuki ˎˊ˗

blog.name: greenvalleybroccoli
blog.title: Deku Said Trans Rights!!!
blog.description: Hi, I'm Bennett. I'm 24 but I have trouble with social stuff so I might come across as immature. I'm studying Japanese and I love BNHA a little too much. I also love my sister @r2-dj! Feel free to ask me anything as long as it's SFW!

summary: I found this so strange when watching the anime, so I’m glad to have a chance to talk about it! Kurogiri speaks in keigo, or...
caption:
I found this so strange when watching the anime, so I’m glad to have a chance to talk about it! Kurogiri speaks in keigo, or honorific language, when addressing the students. Normally you’d use this style of speech to show respect towards someone of higher social status than you (a professor, boss, etc.) I just find it really funny that he uses it toward people he’s about to fight. Such a formal cloud villain dude!

[Text reads: Pleased to meet you. We are the League of Villains. On this occasion…the reason we had the honor of entering this nest of heroes, Yuuei High School, was that we were hoping for the Symbol of Peace, All Might, to kindly lay down his life. Originally, All Might was to have graced us with his presence, but something seems to have changed? Well, that is irrelevant….]

[Translation note: there’s not really an equivalent speech style to keigo in English, so this isn’t a very direct translation. I tried to use the same phrasing as my Japanese teachers do when they try to translate honorific expressions. It comes across as extremely formal in English, but in Japanese it’s not so out-of-place.]

summary: Mean Quirks - Chapter 1 - iluuvdubstep - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Mean Quirks - Chapter 1 - iluuvdubstep - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Category: High school AU, Mean Girls AU

Rating: (so far) Teen And Up Audiences

Summary: After spending nearly his entire life home schooled in the United States, Izuku Midoriya finally moves back to Japan and begins attending UA High School as a new student. Little does he know, he’s in for a roller coaster of a year.A story in which Izuku Midoriya is that niave, jungle girl, and Katsuki Bakugo is that all time favorite mean girl.
